Introduction

Kim Haeri is a South Korean singer and cheerleader under Eyecontact Company. She is part of the cheerleading team TWINKLE and a former member of the girl group LIPBUBBLE, where she was known under the stage name Ella.She made her solo debut on October 6, 2020 with the digital single "OOTD".
